text: Quesiton: I can see a property here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/crm/ui-extensions/sdk#open-an-iframe-in-a-modal> called associatedObjectProperties I have no idea what this is for and I can't find any documentation about that? Does anybody know what this is for?
where do you manage subscription levels? HubSpot or external app?

I have created a new idea post on the community pages for <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1732373714392899|this idea>.  Any one who likes this idea can upvote here.  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/A-HubSpot-User-Should-Be-Able-to-Switch-Their-Main-Team/idi-p/1087025#M201616>
